attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To help the saftey of the public may I strongly suggest that railings are fenced around the platforms of train stations.  I have heard many cases of people falling onto the tracks and think that this risk would be highly reduced by putting a railing around the platforms.

rejection.details: Your title should be a call for action, not a statement.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Statements that don't actually request any action
